description.value:
Crinos is the legendary war form of the Garou — a towering fusion of wolf, human, and spirit.

This form embodies raw Rage and spiritual fury, inspiring terror in mortals and enemies alike. Crinos is designed for battle, domination, and the destruction of the Wyrm’s servants.

Remaining in Crinos form strains the Garou’s self-control and risks Frenzy and Delirium.

Crinos is the legendary war form of the Garou — a towering fusion of wolf, human, and spirit.

This form embodies raw Rage and spiritual fury, inspiring terror in mortals and enemies alike. Crinos is designed for battle, domination, and the destruction of the Wyrm’s servants.

Remaining in Crinos form strains the Garou’s self-control and risks Frenzy and Delirium.

While in Crinos (War Form)Form:

  • Increase in size by 2 to 3 feet

  • Speed : 40 ft

  • If you have at least any rage point uses remaining, consume 1 use and enter Rage.

  • +2 Bonus to AC

  • Advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws

  • Bite: 1d12 + Strength Modifier (piercing)

  • Claw: 1d10 + Strength Modifier (slashing)

Limitiations:

  • You cant cast spells

  • You cant spend Gnosis, unless a Gift explicitly states it can be used while raging

  • You have disadvantage on Charisma checks, and you cant attempt checks to persuade creatures to see you as non-hostile through conversation alone

  • Remaining in Crinos after combat may trigger a Frenzy Check (Dm's discretion)
